Chapter 3 The building blocks of Random Forests: Classification Decision Trees

Chapter 3 The building blocks of Random Forests: Classification Decision Trees introduce decision trees: root node, decision nodes, leaf nodes pros (intuitive, easy to follow) & cons of decision trees (overfitting and greediness). explanation of greediness and the bias-variance tradeoff pruned vs. unpruned trees transition into next chapter – What if we could use many of these weak predictive algorithms to create a more robust one?
